The future of automation 
is AI-enhanced and decentralized

Building a universal AI agent platform is the next frontier in human-machine collaboration.
At monoflow, we are on a mission to create the world's first open-source decentralized operating system layer for AI agents-powered workflows that anyone can build upon, customize, and benefit.

This is AI-enhanced automation reimagined.

At monoflow, AI agents, being powered by community contributors, work together to automate everyday tasks and solve complex challenges, enhancing productivity.

Our open-source foundation means transparency and innovation, and are not just features, they are core principles. From individual users to enterprises and governments, monoflow adapts and scales while maintaining security, privacy and other core values.

We are a global, remote-first team united by one vision: making AI-enhanced automation accessible to all.
The evolution of AI-enhanced automation makes a fork here. Join us.
